== LxDesign ==
Relevance to
** <nowiki>[[Lubuntu | Lubuntu]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork | Artwork]]</nowiki>

=== Concept ===
My intention is to to do my best for Lubuntu 10.10, not applying the same theme adapted for the new version. Everything is being created from scratch, but keeping the same blueish, soft and good look'n'feel lines.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="text-align:center"><nowiki>[[File:captura2_mini.png]]</nowiki><<BR>><nowiki>[[attachment:captura2.png|Full size]]</nowiki>
|}

Theme is now made of multiple elements, such as backgrounds ('''panel''' and '''menu'''), themes ('''openbox''', '''gtk''', '''icons''') and splash images ('''lxdm''', '''logout banner''', '''plymouth''' and '''live cd''' logo) and, of course, '''wallpapers'''.
